Package rationale.emotions.exception

This package houses all the exceptions that would be thrown by this application.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSolutionPathExistsException
    This is a subclass of RuntimeException and would be thrown when there are no solutions found i.e., there exists no path from a given starting point to the point as determined by ChessBoard.
